revision.comment: remove NewPages. sidebar is only for stuff that is absolutely integral. really, we should probably remove one or two of the other ones as well.
revision.text: * navigation ** mainpage|mainpage-description ** wdportal-url|portal ** villagepump-url|villagepump ** special-newitem-url|special-newitem ** special-itembytitle-url|special-itembytitle ** recentchanges-url|recentchanges ** randompage-url|randompage ** wdhelppage|help ** sitesupport-url|sitesupport

{{Main Page/Header | title = Welcome to Wikidata, | motto = the [[Q14075|free]] [[Q593744|knowledge base]] with [[Special:Statistics|{{NUMBEROFARTICLES}}]] [[Wikidata:Glossary#Item|items]] that [[Wikidata:Introduction|anyone can edit]] | langcode = en }} {| cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" | colspan="2" | {{Main Page/Frame | color = 339966 | title = Welcome! | content = '''Wikidata''' is a free [[Q593744|knowledge base]] that can be read and edited by [[Q5|humans]] and machines alike. It is for data what [[commons:|Wikimedia Commons]] is for media files: it centralizes access to and management of structured data, such as interwiki references and statistical information. Wikidata contains data in every [[Q315|language]] supported by the MediaWiki software. '''You can read the [[Wikidata:Introduction|introduction]] to learn more about Wikidata or visit the [[Help:Contents|help portal]].''' '''See Wikidata in action: View [[Q52|the item]] about Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.''' If you'd like to test out the Wikidata software, please use [[Q4115189|the sandbox]]. }} |- style="vertical-align: top;" | style="padding-right: 1.2em; width: 50%;" | {{Main Page/Frame | color = 006699 | title = Contribute | content =
* [[Wikidata:Introduction|Introduction to Wikidata]] * [[Wikidata:Glossary|Glossary of terms used on Wikidata]] * [[Wikidata:List of properties|List of properties used in Wikidata entries]] * [[Wikidata:Community portal|Community portal]] * [[Wikidata:Project chat|Project chat]] * [[Wikidata:List of policies and guidelines|Policies and guidelines]] * [[Help:FAQ|Frequently asked questions]] * Check out some of our best [[Wikidata:Tools|gadgets and scripts]] * Patrol [[Special:RecentChanges|recent changes]] * Help with missing [[Wikidata:Labels and descriptions task force|labels and descriptions]] * Help fixing [[Wikidata:Database reports/Constraint violations/Summary|item properties violating their constraints]] * See latest [[Wikidata:Database reports|database reports]] * [[Special:Random|Improve a random item]] * [[Wikidata:Requests for deletions|Requests for deletions]] * [[Wikidata:Contact the development team|Contact the developers]]

'''[[Wikidata:Contribute|More ways to contribute...]]'''

}} {{Main Page/Frame | color = 006699 | title = Use Wikidata on your wiki | content =
* Wikidata is an open source project, and the data is freely accessible * '''Please note''' that the API for accessing the data ''will change''! * Get the [[:mw:Extension:Wikibase Client|Wikidata client extension]] on your wiki * [[:mw:Extension:Wikibase|Wikibase repository extensions]]
}} | style="padding-left: 1.2em; width: 50%;" | {{Main Page/Frame | color = 990000 | title = News | content =
{{Wikidata:News/en}}
}} {{Main Page/Frame | color = 990000 | title = Staying up-to-date with development | content =
* [[Wikidata:Status updates|Weekly updates]] * [[mail:wikidata-l|Mailing list]] * [[mail:wikidata-tech|Technical mailing list]] * [irc://freenode/wikidata IRC channel][https://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=#wikidata connect] * [https://twitter.com/wikidata Twitter], [https://identi.ca/wikidata identi.ca], [https://www.facebook.com/Wikidata Facebook], [https://plus.google.com/105776413863749545202/posts Google+], [https://www.quora.com/Wikidata Quora] * [[meta:Global message delivery/Targets/Wikidata|On-wiki newsletter]] ([[meta:Wikidata/Newsletter/Archive|archive]]) * [[Wikidata:Events|Events]] * [[Wikidata:Press coverage|Press coverage]]
}} |- | colspan="2" | {{Main Page/Frame | title = Sister projects | content = {{Main Page/Sister projects}} }} |} [[Category:Wikidata-en| ]]
